channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:45 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creat by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 18:45 Dumping anxiety in the Sumy region.Creat by further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 18:44 Auxiliary in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 18:44 Auxiliary in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
